Looks like some other thread tears down the editor during selectAndReveal(...)

looks very much like bug 60133, marking as dup of the newer since that contains
the discussion about the possible vm cause. Please reopen the other PR if you
still see this.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 60133 ***
